鍉字的基本解释

鍉
chí
匙，勺子：“牵马操刀，奉盘错鍉，遂割牲而盟。”
钥匙。

鍉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dī］
［《廣韻》都奚切，平齊，端。］
(1)歃血器。
(2)中医九针之一。参见“鍉鍼”。
(3)通“鏑”。箭镞。
[②]［chí］
［《集韻》常支切，平支，禪。］
钥匙。

鍉字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍉； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1313第08
【廣韻】都奚切【集韻】都黎切，?音低。【玉篇】鋒也。　又【集韻】田黎切，音題。歃血器。　又【集韻】【韻會】?常支切，音匙。鑰也。【正字通】鑰鍉，所以啓鑰者，俗作匙，讀時、矢二音。鑰以閉戸，鍉以啓鑰，鎖腹有須，鍉入內鉤合其須，則鑰開。鍉與鑰別，舊註鑰也，非。　又【後漢·隗囂傳】牽馬操刀，奉盤錯鍉，遂割牲而盟。【註】字詁：鍉卽題，音徒啓反。方言曰：宋楚之閒謂盎爲題。據下文云鍉不濡血，明非盆盎之類。前書漢遣韓昌等，與單于及大臣俱登諾水東山，?白馬，單于以徑路刀金留犂撓酒。應劭云：留犂，飯匕也。撓，攪也。以匕攪血而歃之，今亦奉盤措匙而歃也。以此而言，鍉卽匙字。　又【正韻】丁歷切，音的。【五音集韻】唾器。　又與鏑同。【史記·秦楚之際月表】銷鋒鏑。【註】鏑，一作鍉。索隱曰：鏑，音的，鍉字亦音的。【前漢·項籍傳】銷鋒鍉。【註】鍉與鏑同。箭足也。

鍉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鍉字的起名意思

暂无。

Xing
Basic explanation of words
Xing
chí
Spoon, spoon: "Leading the horse to handle the sword, serving the wrong dish, and then cutting off the sacrifices and ally."
key.
Xing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dī］
["Guang Yun" are all cut, flush, and end. ]
(1) Blood organs.
(2) One of the nine needles of traditional Chinese medicine. See "Single Needle".
(3) Through "Dy". Arrowhead.
[②]［chí］
["Jiyun" regular branch cut, flat branch, Zen. ]
key.
Xing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鍉; Kangxi strokes: 17; Page number: page 1313 to 08
[Guangyun] Du Xiqie [Jiyun] Du Liqie, low sound. [Jade articles] Feng also.　[Jiyun] Tian Liqie, phonetic title. The blood vessel.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Changzhi cut, key. Key also. [Zhengzitong] Key Xing, so the key opener, commonly used as the key, read the second sound of the time and the arrow. The key is used to close the key, and the key is used to open the key. There is a beard in the lock belly. The key is opened when the key is hooked into the beard. Xing and key are not, the old key is also not.　[Later Han·Kai Xiao Chuan] Leading horses and swordsmanship, feasting on the wrong pan, then cut off the sacrifices and confederate. [Note] Word Interpretation: The title of 鍉卽, the sound of the disciple is reversed. The dialect said: Song Chu's leisure is called Ang. According to the following text, if you don't squeeze blood, it is not a penang or the like. In the first letter, Han sent Han Chang, etc., together with Shan Yu and ministers, made the promise of Shui Dongshan, Baima, and Shan Yu used the path to the knife and left the plow to scratch the wine. Ying Shaoyun: Staying in the plow, also in the rice dagger. Scratch, stir too. It is ashamed to stir the blood with a dagger, and today it is also ashamed to serve as a countermeasure. In this regard, the key word 鍉卽.　[Zheng Yun] Ding Liqie, sound. [Pentagram rhyme] saliva.　Same as Di. 【Historical Records·Monthly Table of Qin Chu Period】Sales Feng Dy. [Note] Dysprosium, one is used as a 鍉. Suo Yin said: Dy, sound, also sound. [Previous Han·Xiang Ji Chuan] Pin Fengxie. [Note] Xing and Dy are the same. Arrow foot also.

Old glyph
Xing
Name meaning
Nothing.
dī, tí, chí
сущ.
1) dī вм. 镝 (остриё копья, наконечник стрелы)
2) dī вм. 镝 (хим. диспозий)
3) chí вм. 匙(ключ замочный)
4) tí * ложечка для намазывания губ кровью жертвы при заключении клятвенного союза
